#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        string str;
        cin>>str;
        int has[256]={0};
        int len = str.length();
        for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
            has[str[i]] = has[str[i]] + 1;
        int coun=0;
        for(int i=65;i<=122;i++)
            if(has[i]>0){
                float x = has[i];
                coun+=ceil(x/2);
            }
        cout<<coun<<endl;
    }
}
